landing.hero_description: Post your data analysis projects, get matched with expert analysts by our team, and receive actionable insights through interactive dashboards — all within a secure environment.
landing.how_it_works_sub: From project creation to dashboard delivery in four steps
landing.step1_desc: Clients define their analysis needs — choose the type and field of analysis, describe requirements, upload datasets, and set a deadline.
landing.step2_desc: Qualified data analysts browse open projects and submit applications. Our admin team reviews each application for quality and fit.
landing.step3_desc: Our platform administrators carefully review applications and assign the best-fit analyst to your project, ensuring quality and security.
landing.step4_desc: The assigned analyst works within the platform to build interactive dashboards with actionable insights, delivered directly to you.
landing.about_p1: Thaqib is a secure data analytics marketplace built to bridge the gap between organizations that need data-driven insights and skilled analysts who can deliver them.
landing.about_p2: Our platform provides a supervised environment where clients can safely share their data, and analysts can work on meaningful projects — all under the oversight of our administrative team to ensure quality, security, and trust.
landing.about_p3: Unlike traditional freelancing platforms, Thaqib is purpose-built for data analytics. Every feature — from project creation with analysis type classification, to the no-download data security policy, to the interactive dashboard delivery system — is designed specifically for the data analytics workflow.
landing.security_desc: Your data is protected at every stage with multiple layers of security designed specifically for sensitive business data.
landing.sec1_desc: Datasets cannot be downloaded from the platform. All analysis is performed within Thaqib, ensuring your data never leaves the secure environment.
landing.sec2_desc: Strict permissions ensure users only access data relevant to their role. Clients see their projects, analysts see assigned work, admins oversee everything.
landing.sec3_desc: All user sessions are encrypted with industry-standard protocols. Passwords are hashed using bcrypt with high-cost salt rounds.
landing.sec4_desc: Analyst assignment is managed exclusively by platform administrators, adding an extra layer of vetting and security to every project.
landing.sec5_desc: All project activities, data uploads, and communications are tracked within the platform for complete accountability.
landing.sec6_desc: All chat between clients and analysts happens within the platform, only after admin approval — no external data sharing channels.
landing.contact_desc: Have questions about Thaqib? Want to learn more about how we can help your organization? Get in touch with our team.
landing.contact_required: Please fill in all required fields
landing.contact_sent_desc: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
